name: Biker Floor On Lava
description:
The Floor is burning of LAVA. You need to ride on a bike and drive fast and collect as many coins as possible. An epic bike racing game full of fun and adventure.

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap to Jump
- Double Tap to Double Jump

Features
- Fast Speedy Bike
- Lava
- Super Smooth Controls
- Easy Animations
- Cool Sound Track
